summary: A suite of unit tests that validate the AWS Resilience Hub client’s core functionalities—creating and managing applications, resiliency policies (including advanced settings), handling application components and resources, publishing drafts, and applying tags—using Moto to mock AWS services and boto3 interactions.
business_intent: Ensure the Resilience Hub SDK behaves correctly across typical and edge‑case scenarios, giving developers confidence that application and policy management, resource operations, and tagging work reliably in production environments.
